mapper.select: SELECT b.bno bno, b.categorie categorie, b.title title, b.content content, b.writer writer, b.regDate regDate, b.updateDate updateDate, b.likes likes, b.views views, f.fileName fileName, m.nick writerName, m.fileName profile FROM b_board b LEFT JOIN b_file f ON b.bno = f.bno JOIN member m ON b.writer = m.usermail WHERE b.bno = #{bno}
